title: MPI AB EAS Data Catalog Schema

data_catalog_entry_id.title: Data Catalog Entry Id
data_catalog_entry_id.description: This is unique identifier for the entry you data catalog entry you want to archive. For example one could use `coiba_capuchins_july_2021` or `kob_apple_data_2021`.

data_catalog_entry_details.title: Data Catalog Entry Details
data_catalog_entry_details.description: This is particular info about the entry.

project_name.title: Project Name
project_name.description: This is the name of your server folder if it is a long term project. It is a drop down menu which needs to get updated as projects are added.

server_address.title: Server Address
server_address.description: location on server where data catalog entry is stored

people.title: People
people.description: People involved in project. Make an an entry for each person.

role.title: Role
role.description: What is role in project (dropdown menu)

uploader.title: Uploader
uploader.description: whether they are responsible for data catalog entry upload.

name_loc.title: Local Name
name_loc.description: local name at fieldsite (i.e. mono cariblanco)

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Info about location(s) of data collection.

park.title: Park/Protected Area
park.description: name of park or protected area if applicable

field_station.title: Field Station
field_station.description: name of field station i.e. BCI or Mpala or KOB if applicable

lat_long.title: Lat Long
lat_long.description: Latitude (e.g. 9.167) and Longitude (e.g. 47.679) in Decimal Degrees

dates.title: Dates
dates.description: Select a range of dates where data will be/was collected.

data_type_overview.title: Data Type Overview
data_type_overview.description: Type(s) of data that will be collected such as behavioral, movement, ecological, tissue samples. Select from a drop down menu, and let us know if you want to make another (or fork and modify changes and ask to merge)

data_description.title: Data Description
data_description.description: A brief free form text entry describing the data and general goals of project. Can be lifeted from your Data Management Plan.

funding_sources.title: Funding Sources
funding_sources.description: A list of all grants numbers, agencies, and istituons that funded this field work.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Relevant Keywords that you think describe your project
